info.additionalInfo: Updates 03/04/2011 New buttons like the mockups only for the :about pages New net error and blocked page like mockups 31/05/2011 Bugs fixed on about:config | List box like windows 7 native 15/12/2011 Support for all about: pages -visit about:about- and ftp:// pages 21/07/2012 New about: Pages and buttons like UX Mockups 03/07/2012 Bugs fixed on about:config 23/09/2012 Totaly Improved! 09/10/2012 about:newtab Surprise! 16/10/2012 about:blocked page Improved 21/12/2012 richlistitem, about: pages improved 01/01/2013 about:addons Improved | Code size Improved 11/01/2013 New Warning Icons 27/03/2013 Bugs Fixed on Windows 7 Basic 15/07/2013 Warnning Icons Bugs Fixed Looks better whith http://userstyles.org/styles/44811/ (new warning icons) See my other styles http://userstyles.org/users/82707
